snippet: The L.A. design event, which took place last weekend, was a promenade for a kind of aesthetic — like the Source Family by way of Georgia O’Keefe — that is very much in style right now.
abstract: The L.A. design event, which took place last weekend, was a promenade for a kind of aesthetic — like the Source Family by way of Georgia O’Keefe — that is very much in style right now.

headline.main: Observed | At the Echo Park Craft Fair, California-Style Spirituality Rises Once Again
